TopicTitle: Using mac, update button not doing anything just opening up terminal

Articles.Content: I am using a mac and the update button on the launcher is not working. It just opens up terminal and nothing happens. Please help.

Unfortunately, this is a known issue with no fix, but there is a fairly obvious workaround listed in The Mac OS X Thread (link in my signature).

Also, welcome to the forums! You should check out the important links at the top of The Mac OS X Thread and the How to Get Support sticky at the top of this forum. There's a lot of information there to help you solve problems on your own, though we try to help as long as you provide enough information.
